only because of a defect in the bars. It
remains equally absurd if we imagine it is not a burglar who climbs in, but
an innocent person who blunders or falls in. Again, suppose it were like this:
people-seeds drift about in the air like pollen, and if you open your win-
dows,  one  may  drift  in  and  take  root  in  your  carpets  or  upholstery.  You
don’t want children, so you fix up your windows with fine mesh screens, the
very best you can buy. As can happen, however, and on very, very rar
